data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Free kick Lyon.
In the minute 2, Ball safe as Lyon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Lorient awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Lorient to take a throw-in in Lyon territory.
In the minute 4, Clement Turpin awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Lyon in the half of Lorient.
Throw-in for Lyon close to the penalty box.
In the minute 7, Lyon have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
Lyon are in shooting range from this free kick.
Maxwel Cornet of Lyon smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 9, Clement Turpin awards Lorient a goal kick.
Lyon have a goal kick.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Lyon.
In the minute 12, Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
Throw-in Lyon.
Can Lyon capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 15, Adrian Grbic is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In Lorient a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Lorient.
Pierre-Yves Hamel (Lorient) has replaced the possibly injured Adrian Grbic at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
Can Lyon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Lorient's half?
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
In the minute 21, Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
Free kick Lorient.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Lorient in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lorient.
Lyon drives forward and Sinaly Diomande gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 31, Clement Turpin signals a throw-in for Lyon, close to Lorient's area.
Lorient needs to be cautious. Lyon have an attacking throw-in.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In the minute 35, Free kick for Lyon in the half of Lorient.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Lorient in their own half.
Throw-in for Lyon at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
In the minute 36, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In the minute 38, Lyon are coming forward and Sinaly Diomande gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
In Lorient a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 39, Goal kick for Lyon at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
Lyon have a dangerous throw-in.
Enzo Le Fee is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
In the minute 43, Lorient's Vincent Le Goff is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Lyon in their own half.
Enzo Le Fee returns to the field for Lorient after picking up a slight injury.
In the minute 44, Clement Turpin signals a Lyon throw-in in Lorient's half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Enzo Le Fee.
Lyon are pushing forward but Houssem Aouar's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 45, Lorient have a goal kick.
The 1st half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Lyon.
In the minute 45, Lyon's Rayan Cherki misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
Clement Turpin signals a Lorient throw-in in Lyon's half.
In the minute 45, The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway in Lorient.
Lyon to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
The away team have replaced Sinaly Diomande with Memphis Depay. This is the first substitution made today by Rudi Garcia.
In the minute 46, Thomas Monconduit is replacing Enzo Le Fee for Lorient at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
Clement Turpin awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 51, Throw-in high up the field for Lorient in Lorient.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Lorient.
Lyon pushes forward through Maxwel Cornet, whose finish on goal is saved.
Clement Turpin awards Lorient a goal kick.
Free kick for Lyon in their own half.
In the minute 53, Pierre-Yves Hamel (Lorient) has received a yellow card from Clement Turpin.
In the minute 54, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Marcelo for Lyon who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Lorient have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
Goal kick for Lyon at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
In the minute 57, Marcelo for Lyon is back on the field again.
Free kick for Lyon in the half of Lorient.
Lorient will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Lyon.
In the minute 62, In Lorient, Houssem Aouar (Lyon) misses the target with a header.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Lorient.
Goal! Yoane Wissa gives Lorient a 1-0 lead in Lorient.
In the minute 63, Pierre-Yves Hamel instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Lyon in the half of Lorient.
Free kick Lyon.
In the minute 68, Lorient have a goal kick.
Clement Turpin awards Lorient a goal kick.
Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Lorient.
In the minute 72, Lyon have been awarded a corner by Clement Turpin.
Corner awarded to Lyon.
In Lorient a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 74, Leo Dubois levels the score at 1-1.
Lyon make their third substitution with Thiago Mendes replacing Jean Lucas.
Rudi Garcia (Lyon) is making a second substitution, with Tino Kadewere replacing Rayan Cherki.
In the minute 76, Christophe Pelissier is making the team's third substitution at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir with Jonathan Delaplace replacing Fabien Lemoine.
Ball goes out of play for a Lorient goal kick.
Free kick Lorient.
In the minute 79, Clement Turpin signals a free kick to Lyon in their own half.
Lyon awarded a free kick in their own half.
The away team replace Maxwel Cornet with Melvin Michel Maxence Bard.
In the minute 84, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Lyon get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Lorient's half?
Ball safe as Lorient is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 86, Memphis Depay's header is off-target for Lyon.
Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
Lyon to take a throw-in in Lorient territory.
In the minute 88, Lorient have a goal kick.
Lyon's Melvin Michel Maxence Bard misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Lorient at Stade Yves Allainmat-Le Moustoir.
Throw-in Lorient.
In the minute 89, Franklin Wadja is replacing Pierre-Yves Hamel for the home team.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Lorient in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 1-1.
Paul Nardi for Lorient has been booked by Clement Turpin and receives a first yellow card.
